website_summaries.verdict: This clever cheese board transforms from a wedge to a multilevel, 18-inch cheese board, and even includes utensils suitable for cheese-serving.
pros: Folds away to a compact 9.5-inch size wedge for easy storage
Features a hidden drawer that contains three stainless steel cheese tools
cons: A bit pricy compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: This item is total crap, DO NOT buy! I received it in an undamaged box, so I know it was not damaged during shipping. As soon as I took it out of the box, it fell apart. It is glued together with very cheap wood glue. Very cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: michael rupert

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This board arrived today in perfect condition. It’s absolutely beautiful and very heavy and sturdy. We have a lot of get togethers with family and always have a meat, cheese and cracker tray, along with a veggie tray. I can’t wait to take this out and use it! The family will be very impressed! Plus, as certain foods disappear, you can close up sections to make it smaller 😃. The sections that expand seem very sturdy (almost harder to pull out), so I don’t see a problem with moving it around and having it stay in place. I just LOVE this board! 😍
customer_reviews.author: T. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love the compact storage and the serving capability!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product holds a lot and very durable. Used it many times already and had many compliments just bought 2 for gifts. I think I may need to put some oil for the wood other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pietrosimone

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time yesterday. I was really pleased with it. I love the way it folds up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brean

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea  !! Unique
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 of these, a gift for couples in my family. They entertain frequently and this is a great way to save space, display and serve food for the get togethers. It looks great and really saves space. Came with cheese spreader, too. I'd buy again and it makes a great hostess gift or for anyone wanting to put the food out in a practical and pretty way. I slides together when done, and actually forms a "wedge of cheese". Fun
customer_reviews.author: D. lariscy

customer_reviews.title: This nice folding/sliding bamboo board was the perfect Christmas gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Made Christmas. This nice folding/sliding bamboo board was the perfect Christmas gift for my husband who likes woodmaking. We use it at home and it works great. We have not traveled with it, nor do we plan to. This gift was selected off of the function, storage space, and craftiness. I would recommend this over the non-folding ones any day. I love how I can slide the pieces back into each other and put it away until next event. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The quality is excellent, there is a lot more room than most ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! The quality is excellent, there is a lot more room than most charcuterie boards, and it stores away nicely!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.Mahan, Author

customer_reviews.title: Broken twice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. Ordered one and back piece was broken. Ordered another and the back piece was broken! Decided to glue it myself because I love the design. Could never gift because two came broken.
customer_reviews.author: D. J.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Topped All My Friends' Charcuteries
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the more expensive Charcuteries in Amazon but I loved it at first sight so I bought it. It's bigger than other charcuteries I've seen but it's very unique. definitely recommend it. Even if you can;t fill the entire surface, you can only use 3/4th or half and keep the rest of it hidden. It still looks very unique and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Sara f

customer_reviews.title: Unique product
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely a conversational piece. I gave it as a gift to my daughter who entertains a lot. She loves it and everyone always has something positive to say about it. If you want to wow! someone, this is the gift at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kobzoff

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: Compact storage. Spreads out nicely as cheese board. Appetizer display. Love it for Party or holiday use. Plenty of surface area. Bought a second one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Moore

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack, great quality, & beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this! It's beautiful and folds up nice & compact. I've taken it on vineyard and cabin trips. It makes presentation lovely by having 4 different levels. The knives are great quality too. Would make an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: The top was scratched.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was in time and quick. The wood looks like the picture. It's very heavy, but that's indicated in the description. The product is generally good. Mine had a scratch on top, it looks like it has been used before. I don't have time to return it and wait for another one. This is why it's a 3.
customer_reviews.author: Hideya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, lightweight and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The star of our Thanksgiving dinner. Every single guest asked about this cheese board. Very versatile, easy to clean and most important easy to store. I love, love, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Muriel

customer_reviews.title: This product is so awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this cheese tray. It is so much fun to use and we are using it often. Plenty of room for everything and great tools to assist in serving yourself. LOVE IT! The price is a little high but the quality makes it worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Lowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged when it arrived. I've returned and reordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever, sturdy, Unique Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: This cutting/serving piece is perfect for tail gating, boating, or even to use at home. The wood was sturdy and attractive. An optimum feature is how small it folds for storage. It was a gift for friends (who have everything) and they used it the day after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Betc

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality! Many broken pieces. Just so terribly made. Sad, because I really thought this would make a great closing gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift and it was loved. Family has had many cheese and wine parties since received
customer_reviews.author: Mf Hinesly

customer_reviews.title: This cheese platter is awesome - I love how you can use however many ...
customer_reviews.text: This cheese platter is awesome - I love how you can use however many levels you want. The drawer for the utensils is so cool and keeps them stored so I won't lose them! I would have given five stores, but it is a bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: Every year a group of us girls go to the beach for my sisters birthday. I gave this to her as a gift and she as well as all the girls, absolutely loved it. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debi C

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, great design and makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, great design and makes a great gift. This is the 3rd one we buy for house warming gifts and for our self.
customer_reviews.author: Izak K.

customer_reviews.title: I returned it w/out using, pieces were not staying glued
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea but there were flaws with the item, i.e. the glue was not keeping it together so I returned it. Probably would have been fine if I had glued the parts together, but I didn't feel it was worth the price if I had to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Petie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift the recipient absolutely loved it. Other people were jealous
customer_reviews.author: Brandon James

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet but I really like how it functions.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents for Christmas. They love it, and they’re making me send them the link because all their friends are asking where they can get one. Stores very easily and compactly, very great idea for anyone who loves to entertain.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party server
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and they loved it! Perfect size to stow away and bring out when guests arrive. Pretty and attractive for outdoor or indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Karma O'Donal

customer_reviews.title: Very clever design
customer_reviews.text: Very cool design. Bought one as a wedding present, when the wife saw it she wanted one too. Have used it several times and it has drawn raves about its excellent design. Very compact when not in use, holds plenty of items when expanded.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Langley

customer_reviews.title: SO NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this to my cheese loving mother in law for Christmas and I was admittedly a little jealous when she opened up this piece! We will be ordering one for ourselves as well! It is just as it seems and very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wilfong

customer_reviews.title: This was the hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: I received so many compliments on this at my house warming party. I had all types of cheeses, crackers a few grapes and fruit dip’s. It was beautifully set up
customer_reviews.author: tinabobena

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it!! I love the hidden drawer for the cutlery. I also like how it folds in for storage. Really enjoy serving on it. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: memyselfi31

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to have on hand for outdoor concerts and festivals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a complete circle - doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this item as a gift for someone who does a lot of entertaining. While the wood is beautiful, there were two huge problems. First, the pieces are not at 90 degree angles, so no matter how you open it, there will always be a large gap between at least 2 of the pieces - I hope mine was defective - Amazon took it back quite easily. Second, they don't click or lock together at all, so they constantly move around. This is such a great idea, but terribly implemented.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for family member. She loves it and uses it all the time. Neat concept and well executed.
customer_reviews.author: Neal F. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 of these
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these as gifts and a 4th for myself! Everyone loves it. So practical and compact
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. It is a unique way to server ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It is a unique way to server finger foods (cheeses, crackers, cold cuts). Storage is simple as it folds down to a 1/4 of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G.

customer_reviews.title: Intact
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect conditions , it is a limitless bigger than I expected which is not a bad thing. It’s adorable , didn’t arrive in pieces or broken
customer_reviews.author: Francisca Reino

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It makes such an attractive spread and looks great folded up on the counter. I get compliments on it every time!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L

customer_reviews.title: No cutlery came with it
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice at first but upon opening we did not receive any one of the knives. Searched everywhere and it was not in the box or in the board itself
customer_reviews.author: Blair B.

customer_reviews.title: i like it! it looks good and functions well
customer_reviews.text: i like it! it looks good and functions well. however i have only used it 5x and the wood is already fraying on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: sunkissbeach

customer_reviews.title: Super Cool! Clever and extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! Can not wait to use this for the upcoming holidays.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Quite a styling cheese board! Got lots of compliments from our guests! 😃

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have not officially used it for a party, but I love the look and durability and can't wait to use it soon.

customer_reviews.title: Chick and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Hard to clean and it it get stained by berries but I still really loved it!!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun board, and it's a piece everyone will talk about at the party. I love that it becomes compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nairi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice:)
customer_reviews.text: Works well and appearance is very nice! Love this product so far!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my parents and they love it! Very well made and can easily fold up for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Danie P

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product and huge space saver. Collapses all the way to a quarter circle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, I really like how it collapsed for easy storage.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and they LOVED it! May have to buy one for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bamboo cheese board Travels great hold a lot V nice presentation

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: This purchase is a gift so I cannot rate. The birthday is in June.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I am an event planner and use this all the time for my functions. Love it....
customer_reviews.author: Emily A. Gosewehr

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A great idea for a product. Only problem was the one I ordered came damaged(unglued)
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline K. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful, functional board. I bought one for a party and everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Powell

customer_reviews.title: Received Broken
customer_reviews.text: Upon taking it out of the box I noticed the board was already broken. One of the pieces came disconnected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart before I even used it once!
customer_reviews.text: This literally fell apart on its way out of the box. It's a cool idea, but the quality is terrible. I waited too long to return it and now I'm stuck with the dumb thing (still in the box). If the manufacturer reads this and can take a return at this point, please contact me!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Amazing plate, fits a lot of wine snacks :) On the menu: 3 different grapes, chocolate, Spanish crackers, almonds, Hamon, cheeses: Asiago, parmiggiano, Gruyere, creamy havarti, sharp cheddar, Gouda, Brie, blue cheese and alioli, I think I am only missing olives :) wines: Rioja and Gewurtztraminer :)
customer_reviews.author: Nadya

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Don't listen to poor reviews about faulty products!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any of the issues that others had about falling apart and overlap. I've been using this for a month now and have traveled with it and used it at 5 parties - was a hit! Fits a lot and it's easy to make your food look great! Picture: I convinced my New Year's guests that I had made some great wood fired pizza by putting Domino's thin crust varieties out on this tray! Lol.. It's all about presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: As clever and stylish as it is practical
customer_reviews.text: I have the square version as well, but love this one even more, as you can arrange different appetizers/fruit/cheese on the different levels/wedges, making for an attractive tableau. Love the pull out drawer with the cheese knives and the way it folds into a single wedge that looks beautiful left out on a counter. Great for parties and holiday meals.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burik

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gift and awesome for get together
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my partner who is obsessed with Cheese Boards. This is his go-to cheese board due to the layers and versatility of it. When we have get together this is the first thing he pulls out and it folds up to fit pretty much anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Concept Great, Build Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The idea and concept for this were great, however with just minimal use (and I mean very minimal) portions of the board literally fell off in chunks. You can tell that the bamboo is pieced together in blocks, and I am not sure if the glue just wore out. It is unfortunate because we really loved this board and wanted to get more use out of it. Using it just a few times though it literally fell apart. Unfortunately it is too far past to get a refund on this item. Hopefully I can contact the manufacturer and they will help out with the matter. If so, I can potentially update this review with a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Stolte

customer_reviews.title: Impress your guests with this cool serving tray!
customer_reviews.text: This product brings out the WOW factor every time it is being used. The multi-tiered server has lots of surface area for all of your charcuterie/cheese/appetizer needs. I like that all the shelves nestle inside one another to make storage easy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Le

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved this!! I also bought one as a gift. It’s well made and sturdy and is of high quality. It’s a great serving piece to have for a charcuterie board or cheese, crackers, fruit. Whatever you like.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Moquin

customer_reviews.title: I am so delighted with it
customer_reviews.text: Ooh la la. I had to wait a couple months for this as it was out of stock. I am so delighted with it!! It is a storage dream and a serving conversation piece. It is easy to set up and has loads of area. My daughter's wedding is coming up and we have already used it for get togethers. This is a good value for a beautiful serving piece. The
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this set
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this set! Fits everything from a few nuts to a few variety of cheeses and meats AND bread or crackers, without being to big, heavy or bulky. I ALWAYS get compliments on my little serving tray when I whip this bad boy out! The quality is very good and its very easy to clean. Opens easily, the utensils are beautiful and conveniently stored below and I'm super happy i bought this :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Cheese Board
customer_reviews.text: Th iij s cheese board is a great display of meats, fruits and cheeses. It cleans easily and stores away compactly. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece and has been used multiple times already. This was a gift to my mother whom entertains frequently. She loves the versatility of the piece and the collapsibility for storage. Its well made and a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Ami Shade

customer_reviews.title: Great for anyone wanting to bring a charcuterie to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and received rave reviews!! Great for anyone wanting to bring a charcuterie to a gathering or event since it collapses and has utensils stowed in the little drawer. This is a great item to keep on hand on RV’s, Yachts/Houseboats, etc.. Also fabulous for use at home, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cheeseboard
customer_reviews.text: Unique. Good amount of surface area for use. Utensils all in one place. Compact when all folded up. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Neal

customer_reviews.title: Neat design but fragile product
customer_reviews.text: We liked the design and the concept but unfortunately it arrived partially broken and another piece of it broke when we unpacked it. Wood around the edges is thin and seems like it would be prone to breaking. Perhaps more padding during shipping would have helped it not arrive broken, however it does seem like a very fragile product. We ended up ordering a different plate from the same brand which seemed much more solid.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: It is probably perfectly fine for home use
customer_reviews.text: This is really disappointing for the price. The unit has no stops, so the drawer can pull completely out and the four rotating quarters can continue free spinning. It is probably perfectly fine for home use. However, for boat use, it just sucks.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and compact for storage!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is a perfect size for a 4-6 person party were cheese and crackers are served. When your done, its compact for storage in a corner location on your counter top. We have used it a few times since Christmas and have had no breakage as others noted. Will follow-up if so but for now, its a creative gift and nice value product.
customer_reviews.author: LevitMan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to use at a party. Make sure you take care of things and follow the directions for care and all will be good.
customer_reviews.author: BigfishTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Well made, well designed
customer_reviews.text: Well made, well designed, little cheese tools are acceptable quality. Great for taking someplace, folds up nicely. Will probably last for many years unless you leave it in water.
customer_reviews.author: d'Artagnan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely presentation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and was immediately envious when my friend opened this up. It is fabulous and going on my list for Santa this year. Not only does the wood look and feel high end, but the mult level presentation is fun. Plus two wood handled utensils tucked in their own dryer? Lots to love about this particularly if you enjoy entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Margi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to show and store!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift, made your favorite person stand out at their next social gathering - rave reviews by guests.... perfect to show and store
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Very good quality. Clever space saving design. Attractive and functional. Quite large.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Loesch

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I sent the item back practically next day. The construction itself is very shaky. So, it came to no surprise to find one of the side panels detached. It looks pretty on the picture, but I doubt it would last long.
customer_reviews.author: Irina B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these cheese boards as gifts and an additional one for ourselves. The quality is excellent, the boards are beautiful, and they were greatly appreciated by our gift recipients. Just ordered two more for gifts ~ fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rala

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Design and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift in my family gift exchange. My sister n'law who is a foodie received this gift and loved it. She just raved about it. I will be getting one of these for my home soon. Such a great idea. Who really as all that space to store something that large. Brilliant design and the quality of wood is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Dena B

customer_reviews.title: Love this cheese board.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cheese board. Have had many compliments from guests on how nice it is. Makes a good presentation. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan N.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheese Board Set on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: The design and the functionality of this picnic tray/cheese board make it easy to use and to store when not being used. Beautiful product design and material! Definitely going to be recommending to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Max Frischman

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my picnic. Everything fit on it and was easy to clean. Will always use at holiday parties; fits so much, but doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Mischief Managed

customer_reviews.title: It was a wonderful addition to my entertaining pieces
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this larger Board and just used it to entertain friends this past weekend. It was a wonderful addition to my entertaining pieces.

customer_reviews.title: The item looks really cool and I like the concept
customer_reviews.text: The item looks really cool and I like the concept, but when we removed it from the box it literally fell apart into pieces. Appears to be cheaply glued together. Was really expecting higher quality. Fortunately Amazon is great about returns.
customer_reviews.author: realmom

customer_reviews.title: Makes the other housewives jealous
customer_reviews.text: Great design and has held up well after multiple uses. Have taken it to parties and people always ask where they can get one too, or if they can have mine...no!! Lol

customer_reviews.title: Very smart design
customer_reviews.text: Cool kitchen accessory for any type of party. This is very well built. I love how it opens up to a large circle so you can serve a lot of food on it and then it folds up to a 1/4 of the size for easy storage. The hidden cheese knife compartment is a great feature too.
customer_reviews.author: John Coctostan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and dil for their housewarming party and it was a huge hit with everyone there! Scored points for sure! Now I want one for myself. Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Really cool. I got lots of questions about where I ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cool. I got lots of questions about where I got it whenever I use it.

customer_reviews.title: but still not very cool when it's brand new
customer_reviews.text: Part of the tray snapped off when we took it out of the box. Just took some wood glue to it, but still not very cool when it's brand new.

customer_reviews.title: I would have loved it but I had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: It cam broken . I would have loved it but I had to send it back!

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Really nice tray. Wanted something different to serve meats and cheeses - this fit the bill. I like that is is compact for storage.

customer_reviews.title: My sister loved loved loved this so much
customer_reviews.text: My sister loved loved loved this so much, she loved doing fancy cheese stuff so it is great for her.

customer_reviews.title: Really like how it folds away for storage
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board is well made. Very solid construction. Really like how it folds away for storage. Would absolutely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I bought it for a Christmas present and it is awesome. Thinking about getting one for myself!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for parties and hosting!
customer_reviews.text: My mom LOVED this as a gift. She hosts parties and genuinely was excited at how big and beautiful it was. No more cheese on a Correlle plate! We were very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the host/hostess
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a unique gift and this was it. It is very solid. Easy to store.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastico!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful and works perfectly! Love the functionally and versatility! I'm giving one as a gift to my mom and a good friend! Really, I only wanted something nice to put on the table when I introduced artisan cheese to my 11 year old twins boys and 5 year old son. We watched the movie "The Boxtrolls" and they inquired about the cheeses made popular by the movie! So I thought this was a good excuse to buy a nice cheese board. Now, even though I was only entertaining kids, I think anyone would love this!!! See the pic attached!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
